mapper.sql: t1.detectionDetailId, t1.patientId, t1.patientNo, t1.seqNo, t1.detectionItemId, t1.detectionItemCode, t1.detectionItemName, t1.detectionResult, t1.prompt, t1.resultType, t1.unit, t1.refrenceRange, t1.refrenceRangeMin, t1.refrenceRangeMax, t1.detectionMethod, t1.reagentBrand, t1.instrument, t1.createTime, t1.detailID, t1.mainID, t1.updateTime, t1.syncTime, t1.syncFlag
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO lis_db.eci_detection_detail( detectionDetailId, detectionReportId, patientId, patientNo, seqNo, detectionTypeName, detectionItemId, detectionItemCode, rawDetectionItemCode, detectionItemName, detectionItemEnglishName, detectionResult, prompt, unit, refrenceRange, refrenceRangeMin, refrenceRangeMax, detectionMethod, reagentBrand, instrument, createTime, updateTime, syncTime, syncFlag, mainID, detailID,
promptType, rawCreateTime )VALUES( #{detectionDetailId}, #{detectionReportId}, #{patientId}, #{patientNo}, #{seqNo}, #{detectionTypeName}, #{detectionItemId}, #{detectionItemCode}, #{rawDetectionItemCode}, #{detectionItemName}, #{detectionItemEnglishName}, #{detectionResult}, #{prompt}, #{unit}, #{refrenceRange}, #{refrenceRangeMin}, #{refrenceRangeMax}, #{detectionMethod}, #{reagentBrand}, #{instrument}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, NOW(), #{syncFlag}, #{mainID}, #{detailID},
#{promptType}, #{rawCreateTime} )
